doc.name: unlock menus
doc.summary: Sets the lockMenus property to false, so the menu bar is updated when the menus are changed.

examples.example: if the lockScreen is false then unlock menus

description.p: Use the unlock menus command to show changes in the menu bar to the user.
The unlock menus command sets the lockMenus property to true.
When all pending handlers are finished executing, the lockMenus property is set to false, undoing the lock menus command's action. Any changes made to the menus become visible to the user.
